text: While the media focuses on GDPR, let's talk about something that truly matters - cardiovascular disease prevalence! A recent study reveals stark differences between Asians and Americans. Genetics and diet play crucial roles, yet prevention and screening efforts are severely lacking. It's time to prioritize health and well-being over political correctness and bureaucracy.
